text:
Checksum error on 1.1.3 tar

The tar does not extract source code and thus does not build.
creator: Tracy.Monteith@level3.com
cgu@qos.ch
text:
It works for me and many others. The file should be a t.ar.gz and not a .tar. 
Double check your configuration. In any case, try the command

tar xzvf log4j-1.1.3.tar
